text: How can it be winter all of a sudden...?
I'm sorry, you want to know the year?
What a pleasure to meet a Stalker worthy of the name.
It's been far, far too long.
Help me to hold your hand and dance!
You're not the puppet I was expecting.
I heard she was looking for... for someone!
She stepped up only because no one else could.
Too many Stalkers were lost to that evil.
Your survival is all that matters.
Nothing else comes close, not even in my life.
I swear I would be late.
